archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.3.3d: d) security investigation (e.g. gathering additional information to assess whether a potential or actual security incident occurred, classifying the incident according to scale, impact and severity and recommending response actions)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
